title: France panorama. [No. 72/50]
creator_credit: Pathé Frères and Societe d'informations Cinematographiques
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. General Soeharto in Paris - official visit of the Indonesian president. 2. In the news: The Goncourt Prize - the Goncourt Academy names its 1972 award winner; Foodstuffs - the International Foods Salon; Rail record - the turbo-train prototype. 3. Xenakis and the Polytope - Xenakis, musician, engineer and architect. 4. The Francois I. collection - the Louvre honors a great art patron.
